content.text: Bullet in the Chamber
Expanded Weapon Mechanics, by GELUXRUM and eclix

content.help: See roughly how much ammo is left in the magazine e.g. nearly full.
Lowers your weapon and prevents firing while the ammo check is taking place.
Plays foley sounds as you check the magazine. Requires Animations ON.
See the exact amount of ammo left in the magazine e.g. 15/30.
Lowers your weapon and prevents firing while the ammo check is taking place.
Plays foley sounds as you check the magazine. Requires Animations ON.
Enable if you use FallUI - HUD and want a cleaner notification. May be hard to read on compact HUD presets.
Tells you how much ammo in total can be held in the magazine.
Tells you how much ammo is left in your inventory.
Tells you what ammo is currently being used by the weapon.

content.text: • To force a weapon to always use an exact ammo check, add the keyword BitCh_ExactCheckCapability.

content.help: Switch automatic weapons to semi-auto.

content.text:
• Works with all automatic weapons, even if they do not have native semi-auto sounds configured.
• Can be sensitive to script lag under heavy load, causing more than one shot to fire.
• 60% of the time, it works every time.
• Can be used alongside Equiment and Crafting Overhaul's fire mode feature, which isn't sensitive to lag but does require weapons to have semi-auto sounds configured.
• How it works: the script listens for a "start firing" event, then immediately sends a "stop firing" event, as if you had just quickly tapped the trigger.

content.help: Enable reloads that add an extra bullet when reloaded with a non-empty mag.

content.text:
• Simulates a round in the chamber by dynamically adding +1 to the magazine capacity.
• To exclude weapons from this mechanic, add the keyword BitCh_DisableChamberedReload

content.help: Enable BitCh Reload must also be ON.

content.text:
• Requires the mod Tactical Reload.
• Only TR enabled weapons will receive +1 when reloading, all other weapons are excluded.
• To enable BitCh on non-TR weapons, add the keyword BitCh_ForceBitChReload.

content.help: Enable only if you use BCR.

content.text:
• Requires the mod Bullet Counted Reload installed and enabled.
• Fixes the BCR incompatibility.
• Make sure to add the keyword BitCh_DisableChamberedReload to all BCR weapons. Failure to do so will result in a small visual bug under certain conditions.

content.help: If held whilst reloading, ammo will be dropped from the mag. The "Drop Ammo On Reload" toggle must be ON.

content.text:
• Set it to your reload button to make it always active.
• Using modifier keys such as "Shift+R" does not work properly.

content.help: Any ammo remaining in the magazine will be removed from the player's inventory and dropped on the ground.
Enable Ammo Drop must also be ON. Deletes the ammo completely instead of dropping it on the ground.

content.text: • To disable this on certain weapons, add the keyword BitCh_CantDropAmmo.
Press Me If Stuff Decides To Break
content.help: Use this button if stuff doesn't work when reloading.

content.text: Press Me If You Want To Uninstall The Mod
content.help: Use this button to clean up some stuff done by the scripts so that you can uninstall the mod safely without any left-overs from the scripts.
Dual use hotkey: short press to lower your weapon / long press to holster.
Reduces animation speed while walking with a weapon lowered to avoid "speed walking".
Dual use hotkey: short press to reload / long press to check ammo.
If ON, the ammo check will be approximate. If OFF, it will be exact.
Just throws a grenade.
Just does a melee.
Default: 0.3. How long you must hold a key for it to trigger a long press for the dual-use hotkeys.

content.text: Grenade Throwing Requires Weapon to be Holstered
content.help: If ON, you must holster your weapon before throwing a grenade.

content.text:
Keywords that can be added to Weapons or OMODs:

BitCh_DisableChamberedReload - place this on weapons that should not be able to hold an extra round in the chamber e.g. revolvers.

BitCh_CantDropAmmo - place this on weapons that should not be able to drop ammo on reload e.g. Gatling Laser.

BitCh_ForceBitChReload - if you use TR mode, add this to weapons that lack TR patches to allow them to have BitCh reloads.

BitCh_ExactCheckCapability - will return exact amount when using estimate ammo check. Some weapons IRL have mags which show you exactly how many bullets are left inside e.g. P90.
